protein.specific_function: Cadherins are calcium dependent cell adhesion proteins. They preferentially interact with themselves in a homophilic manner in connecting cells; cadherins may thus contribute to the sorting of heterogeneous cell types. May act as a negative regulator of neural cell growth

reference.reference_text: Tanihara H, Sano K, Heimark RL, St John T, Suzuki S: Cloning of five human cadherins clarifies characteristic features of cadherin extracellular domain and provides further evidence for two structurally different types of cadherin. Cell Adhes Commun. 1994 Apr;2(1):15-26.
